EmailTemplate.description: Template for rebate claim rejection notification sent out.
EmailTemplate.name: Rebate claim rejection notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Rebate Claim Rejection notification - {!jj_rb_Rebate_Claim__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Rebate Claim Id: {!jj_rb_Rebate_Claim__c.Name} for {!jj_rb_Rebate_Claim__c.jj_rb_Customer__c} is rejected.
Regards, Rebate Management Team
